posts.content:
Hi

Anyone got bumper deluxe trims? I found some fronts but not the rears!

Also, I need steering parts including the box, column, linkage... wheel.

And cargo door lock mechanism/rods.

In fact I need loads of bits! if you have some stuff feel free to ring me on 07969 078155

THanks

Kevin

I have got myself the steering parts!

Still need
- rear deluxe bumper trims.
- also after a 1776 engine and all anciliaries for rebuild.
- and some deluxe from bench seats.

Kevin
